website_summaries.verdict: If you want a wide range of white light in a smart LED bulb, this is an acceptable LIFX model. In spite of some connection issues, customer service is helpful.
pros: Pairs with most smart devices as easily as other LIFX models
cons: Issues have been reported with it dropping from network connection
LIFX app can't always find network

customer_reviews.title: can't give zero stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use with my echo, the description says works with Alexa, maybe, but only if you have a NON Amazon device. You have to download the app to register the device ant to contact customer support, the app WILL not download on my Windows desktop, there is NO Amazon app so my 2 kindle fires are useless. So I have a very expensive on off light bulb and no way to reach customer support. I see from other reviews lifx does not offer support, but they like your money. Sending back for a refund, will try a NON LIFX product. If you are a Amazon only user, BEWARE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ted R. Whitmore

customer_reviews.title: Not one failed bulb but TWO???
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately not a fan. Purchased two. The first one repeatedly dropped it's Wi-Fi connection (even when tested in the same room as my enterprise grade WAP). The second one was able to get a connection but repeatedly requested a firmware update yet failed the update every single time. Attempted multiple outlets around the house (again, Wi-Fi coverage is great for every other device). REALLY hoping this is either just a bad batch or this specific model since I've got 4 more of the newer A19 model arriving tomorrow. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel R.

customer_reviews.title: Keep a ladder handy to reset these lights
customer_reviews.text: These lights just don't work very well. They fall off the network constantly and this is in a room with a very strong wifi signal. For a comparison, one room further away and outside, I've got a Nest security camera on wifi and it works fine. I have to climb up a ladder and reset one of these lights about twice a week. The setup process is very frustrating, it just doesn't work and you don't get an error message.
customer_reviews.author: Aldo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product and customer support
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with the products. They are easy to install and maintain. I am blown away with the responsiveness of the technical support. I had an issue with a device that I had just purchased. I already have several bulbs, but this one was not functioning properly. I reset it several times and placed the bulb in another lamp. Suddenly an error message appeared. An email was generated by the device reflecting an error. I forwarded to customer support. In about 15 minutes an update to the devices firmware was received. The bulb was updated and immediacy began to function. Incredible. Well done Lifx.
customer_reviews.author: RTP Chester Springs

customer_reviews.title: A terrible mistake
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in late 2016. When I could not make it work with my Echo, I put it aside. Recently, I had some great luck with TP-Link bulbs and smart outlets, and I decided to invest in a SmartThings hub to add flexibility to my system. I easily installed all the Samsung peripherals, and I still cannot get the LIFX bulb to automate,, either with Alexa or with the Samsung Hub. This was a waste of money; should have returned it when I first received it. I am hopeful the manufacturer might see this and agree to allow me to return this for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Mike Peters

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good, worth buying.
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good. I have 5. 3 outside, 2 in door. For some reason one or two will lose connection sometimes, then you need to turn off at source then on again. No need to 'pair' again but need to reset to preferred setting. When they all work they are just what I was hoping for. Small irritant for the benefit. I like being able to change the brightness of the white light. Timer option is great. Can remotely control from anywhere not just at home from smart phone/pad.
customer_reviews.author: kial

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating at First but Well Worth It!!!
customer_reviews.text: Okay! I had issues with the bulb.. it seemed like a lot at first. The software wouldn't update, the bulb wouldn't stay connected to the network, and the app kept shutting down. I called customer service, they were very responsive and knowledgeable. It took some time, a lot back and forth, but after a few days, the bulb works perfectly!! Be patient and let the Lifx folks trouble shoot! It's well worth it and I'm glag I didn't send it back. Definitely ordering for the rest of the house!!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Meh, Color Versions Are Better
customer_reviews.text: Our entire living room is lit with LifX color bulbs and although we've played around with the different effects and colors, we've settle on "warm shades" which have a golden, warm hue. This time I decided to get the white light and it's strangely artificial looking with a slight blue tint. The effects are limited and underwhelming. Next time I'll spend $20 more for the color bulb.
customer_reviews.author: jnet

customer_reviews.title: LIFX - As advertised -- works with Harmony Home Hub (Logitech remote)
customer_reviews.text: As Advertised - a gold plated white-light. Color spectrum is on the money: warm to cool -- dark to brite. Android app setup was confusing and had some delays -- make sure to pick "update firmware" when the option comes up. I left it alone for an hour then came back and everything set up as it should. I even added it to my Logitech Harmony Home Hub so now I don't really need the Lifx app -- I can use the same remote I use for the entertainment center. Nice. I'm too cheap to pay for the full color but I bet it is sweet. Nice and bright -
customer_reviews.author: Craigicus

customer_reviews.title: Likes to go off-line
customer_reviews.text: Very elegant product and packaging, if only it worked as advertised. I connected to the LIFX app with no problem. I could not get Alexa to discover my light bulb no matter what I did. I connected it to my SmartThings and it kept disconnecting. I figured I would just use it with the LIFX app since I liked the warm color, but it keeps going off line every few hours. Extremely unreliable product, and at the price-point it commands, much cheaper bulbs work much better. I will be returning this sketchy product.
customer_reviews.author: Edward G Patterson

customer_reviews.title: get you some of these!
customer_reviews.text: these are some of the best home automation lights available! they require no special hub or router to make network accessible. my parents have connected theirs with alexa for control. i have mine all configured with schedules, and i don't need to mess with them most of the time. i love the slow fade to light up a room in the mornings wake me up. i almost want to buy more lamps for my house so i can more of these bulbs!
customer_reviews.author: Mark McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Rough at first, solid after update
customer_reviews.text: Initial impressions are pretty poor. Connectivity is very spotty. Barely got it setup with the app, then the bulb went offline and will only sporadically connect after. Based on others' reviews it sounds like I may be better off sending it back than trying to troubleshoot... Update: After messing with it a little by turning off the power and turning it on to reboot it (I assume), I got the wifi to get a stable enough connection to update it. It's been much more stable since and seems to be working well. The factory firmware definitely leaves a bad first impression, once past that, it seems like a solid connected bulb.
customer_reviews.author: copjon

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded all my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I am not super computer savvy, so it took a few tries to get it connected to my wifi. Once connected however, it's performance is amazing it's color and intensity can be totally controlled I was able to duplicate my traditional incandesant lights exactly ! Next came connecting them to the Amazon echo device which was a fairly straightforward affair took about 20 minutes for the first bulb, about five minutes for the second bulb
customer_reviews.author: Nick G.

customer_reviews.title: Took about ten minutes
customer_reviews.text: I have read reviews on this light, and I can understand. The instructions leave out one piece of information that connect it to my Echo Alexa. Remember to name the light in a group before using it with Alexa. The light is bright and works perfectly. It is a nice option if you do not want to fiddle with a hub. Remember, my tip and register with Lyfx online.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Light works great with the LIFX app. I have some issues with it using Google Home, but I think it's more Google issue. Only complaint is that after a power outage, the light will turn on when the power comes back, but that's common on automated bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: C. Tre

customer_reviews.title: bought these in june and love them. havent had a single problem with connection
customer_reviews.text: bought these in june and love them . havent had a single problem with connection. I like the app also , it allows you to dim or tune the light as well as some cool stuff your kids will like .highly recomend. also have tp-link bulb that works great if you just need a dimmable bulb without the tunability. And it's 3 or 4 bucks cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Bulbs lose connectivity and each endpoint has to be reconfigured repeatedly
customer_reviews.text: I wish I’d just spent the money and bought Hue lights. These LifX bulbs constantly disconnect from the wifi, and I have to go through the set up at least once a month. Even when they are connected, they default to blindingly white/bright at least once a week. I have three more unopened bulbs in my closet that I will never use. Do not waste your money. Buy a hub. Managing individual endpoints is not worth the time and frustration. I’ve had these bulbs for almost two years, and I hate them.
customer_reviews.author: maggieb

customer_reviews.title: Great bulbs with many options for variability in lighting tone/intensity
customer_reviews.text: Great bulbs with many options for variability in lighting tone/intensity, as well as on/off timing options. Set up is not as intuitive as, say Wemo. But once you get the hang of it they work great and give you the ability to set all lights the same, or vary any/every individual bulb. Hope they come out with bulbs at the higher lumen levels soon. And an outdoor, moisture rated bulb would be great; hope they produce one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bulb a couple of weeks ago and it has worked flawlessly. Not only through the App but also with Amazon's echo. I have the bulb located in an upstairs office in a detached garage about 75 feet away from the router with no interruptions or problems. I have Alexa turn the bulb on each day so my path through the dark garage is lit when I open the door. I've decided to now purchase the color 1000 BR30
customer_reviews.author: don duffield

customer_reviews.title: Great lights
customer_reviews.text: I now have 11 of these lights in my house and I am extremely satisfied with them. I use my echo dots to control the lights and when away from home I use the Lifx android app. The setup was not super simple but it was not difficult. If you have trouble setting up the lights using the android app then just use the Windows 10 app on your computer instead.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Boebel

customer_reviews.title: Nice technology but not reliable. An expensive standard lightbulb
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2. One keeps dropping wireless access and is actually closer to wireless router. Once I figured out how to reset the bulbs I could walk through set up again but continued to drop the wireless connection after a couple of days. It is not the switch or the outlet it was connected to as I had the switch held in place to remain on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very frustrating product. Was unable to get connected
customer_reviews.text: Bought an original LIFX bulb a couple years ago. Worked well enough, decided to add 3 more. I am sending them right back. After fussing with 1 bulb for 45 minutes and never getting connected, decided they are just not worth the money or my time. And, as I already own 1 bulb, I'm not new to the product. I still couldn't figure it out!
customer_reviews.author: J. Glaser

customer_reviews.title: never have to come home to a dark home again.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so that I feel safer coming home at night and love it. I never have to come home to a dark home again. It turns on when the sunsets and turns off after I go to sleep. Bought these for friends and family too. I really like the fact that you do not need a hub for this. The wifi is already built into the light and the setup is super easy.
customer_reviews.author: chilelime7

customer_reviews.title: Limited range for wifi
customer_reviews.text: The bulb works well enough. The range of light options is a plus, but the minimum light level is not low enough to use as an alarm clock (the lowest setting is still quite bright). The major problem: the bulb only works when very close to your wifi router. Even with a clear, unobstructed path, the light could not function more than a few feet from the router. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: T. Huminski

customer_reviews.title: my parents love it. not too bad when you install for ...
customer_reviews.text: my parents love it. not too bad when you install for the first time. Sometimes the software goes out of sync to the actual state of the bulb. You would have to turn off and then turn on the light bulb to get it back.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up, cool technology, awesome WHEN IT WORKS.
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are pretty cool, I like being able to control them from anywhere with my phone! However I have realized that since installing them they tend to disconnect even when we are only using the app and not the switches! I have to turn the light off for a while, and back on using the switch almost EVERY DAY so I can use the bulb with the app like it is supposed to be used! Being able to control the light with my phone is essentially WHY I bought these bulbs, and they generally do not work how they should. I am thinking about returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Halli Boot

customer_reviews.title: but the software or something absolutely sucks! I've had to reset these more times than ...
customer_reviews.text: These work OKAY, but the software or something absolutely sucks! I've had to reset these more times than turning on my lights... when they work don't breathe, because they'll go back on the fritz... I'd do research before buying, and CERTAINLY don't go all in if you think you want to fill your house with these... (but I know a guy who will sell you some! lol)
customer_reviews.author: logan burroughs

customer_reviews.title: When it works it's great...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about twenty minutes. The bulb just as so many other reviews have pointed out, loss network connection constantly. I have tried many remedies to address this, but to no avail.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy LIFX!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy!! Ignore all reviews! The new app is a primitive, useless, kludge.
customer_reviews.author: Bob White

customer_reviews.title: Every bulb i have works great and as described
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using LIFX since it started on kickstarter. Every bulb i have works great and as described. We are using this bulb to get my deaf grandfathers attention when we want him to look at his phone. The strobe features works great for this. Ive already got 4 bulbs but ill be adding more.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer McCabe

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable Brightness - Works With Alexa
customer_reviews.text: I used this in my Kitchen, and it works fine. You do have to download their app and configure the bulb, but that took less than 2 minutes. Once that is done, you can open the Alexa app and add it there. Now I just have to tell Alexa to turn my Kitchen light off or on. Easy to setup and bulb has an adjustable brightness. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: RicoTX

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use. Kids like them, too.
customer_reviews.text: These are fun to play with. I have one in my kids room and I flash it to let them know I'm coming up to make sure they're in bed. I also use the countdown to give them time to read then when it goes off, it's bed time. Sometimes (not often) it loses the wireless connection info and I have to re-pair it again. That and the way to reset the device are two nits. Keep at it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great, tuning the color temperature is fun and useful ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, tuning the color temperature is fun and useful for when you need it more white to feel awake, or more yellow to help sleep. 1 star off because it's way overpriced for being a lightbulb, and also it sometimes fails to respond to my commands - software a little buggy.
customer_reviews.author: C. W

customer_reviews.title: Bulb is great, Android app needs work!
customer_reviews.text: This bulb does what I wanted it to, after some finagling. The Android app was unable to add the bulb to my network, so I resorted to the Windows 10 app on my desktop. Once connect, I am able to use the Android app to control and schedule the bulb. I use it primarily as a gentle wake up light, and it also fades on during sunset. These are excellent features :)
customer_reviews.author: Ben Johns

customer_reviews.title: Great item for building a smart home
customer_reviews.text: Got this item as a used item. The bulb works great but had some connection issues at first but since I got it to work I have not had any issues. I use many lifx lights in my home and they are always easy to use and install.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph C.

customer_reviews.title: Really like it and love the idea but am unable to ...
customer_reviews.text: Really like it and love the idea but am unable to consistently and properly maintain the on/off schedules of the light which is why I bought it. I have the bulbs in two different locations and it seems the app (which you need to control your bulbs) is unable to easily maintain the schedules. And if anyone knows how to reach their customer support let me know. Not very customer-centric at all.
customer_reviews.author: fyi

customer_reviews.title: Terrible customer service only adds to the frustration
customer_reviews.text: This bulb simply doesn't work. No amount of troubleshooting will connect it, and after three days LIFX customer support has done no more than send one email telling me to turn the bulb off, back on and try again. Terrible customer service only adds to the frustration.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Its connection to the AP or router is very problematic - possibly better with WPA rather than WPA2A but its still hit ...
customer_reviews.text: The documentation on the web is inadequate and really just for sales. I can get it to work occasionally but it is entirely unreliable. I have had three IT engineers try to get it going and none of them succeeded. Its connection to the AP or router is very problematic - possibly better with WPA rather than WPA2A but its still hit and miss. A total waste of money and its heading for the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Great lights and app that just work!
customer_reviews.text: We are so in love with our LIFX bulbs! The app, controls and simplicity are amazing! Hope they work with the Amazon Echo eventually because we are VERY disappointed with the Phillips Hues bulbs and integration and constant need to access the hub.
customer_reviews.author: TechnoGeek Girl

customer_reviews.title: App sucks light glitches won’t turn on or off
customer_reviews.text: Disconnects and glitches so much I stopped using it you’re better off going with another smart light
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These bulbs work great and can be controlled from absolutely anywhere
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs work great and can be controlled from absolutely anywhere. They work nicely as a wake-up light and are very easy to setup and program using timers. Much better alternative to Bluetooth bulbs and don't require any type of base station.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota McGilton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent support, bulb works "brilliantly"
customer_reviews.text: Initial router could not connect. New house/FIOS router with help from excellent customer support solved a variety of issues and now my Gen 2 LIFX is online, updated, and I can access my account. Will be purchasing a houseful of LIFX bulbs and thanks for the quality support!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far great bulb, I really like the clean bright white ...
customer_reviews.text: So far great bulb, I really like the clean bright white light, fully adjustable light spectrum. Works well with my WiFi..
customer_reviews.author: Allen Bock

customer_reviews.title: but when it works it is great. It will really benefit from the Flic I ...
customer_reviews.text: Sporadic connect issues makes it less convenient than a regular bulb, but when it works it is great. It will really benefit from the Flic I think. I am still waiting on that though.
customer_reviews.author: R. Stegmaier

customer_reviews.title: Faulty
customer_reviews.text: I tried tirelessly to get these lights to connect to my WiFi network. I tried doing everything in the forums about changing channels, using different routers, and networks passwords etc; and all failed. Would not recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.text: Plenty bright and with adjustable color temperature, easily tuned to the brightness and color desired. At sunrise or sunset I have these configured via IFTTT to change the color of the light to a warmer light, or to turn on and off at scheduled times.
customer_reviews.author: James E.

customer_reviews.title: Really wanted to like these LED Smart Bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to like these LED Smart Bulbs. It started out great with easily installation, a wonderful user interface via their app, and warm whites that were comparable to incandescent bulbs. But the bulbs kept disappearing from the app, and when found requested constant firmware updates. I'm giving up and going with the Philips Hue system which has great reviews on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: I found these light bulbs to not be very reliable ...
customer_reviews.text: I found these light bulbs to not be very reliable compared to the cost. I was using them with the Smartthings hub so you may have other results with another home automation system.
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: The only thing that would make this better was if it had a browser interface for local ...
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that would make this better was if it had a browser interface for local rather than having to load yet another app onto my phone when all I use this for is Alexa. Does a great job on variance of intensity etc. Really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Manges

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating and not woking. May return.
customer_reviews.text: One does not connect! One does not stay connected! Other WiFi lights like Wemo do. Hue lights....work great. These LIFX are frustrating.... This is night one with them. I may need to return them. I will try again in a day or two to see if they work.
customer_reviews.author: Wholigan

customer_reviews.title: Alexa integration and color wheel is great
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these lights on sale. Once installed they perform flawlessly. The white bulb range, connectivity, Alexa integration and remote access makes it a great buy. I will buy them again when the are on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Wayburn

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Easy to set up using ifttt No hub ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Easy to set up using ifttt No hub needed. Works fine with Alexa. Alexa app works with it.. Be sure to "claim" device in set up in order for it to be detectable by Alexa. Outstanding customer service from company.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff G

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of our time as they did not do as ...
customer_reviews.text: Total waste of our time as they did not do as advertised. My husband is a techno/computer geek and could not get these bulbs working properly. Awful tech support. Everything had to be done thru emails. Returned for a full refund from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: Wifi
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these lights and they work great with my Google Home. I will by more! They are very bright and will luminate any room. The nice thing is that they dim and change colors.
customer_reviews.author: P.J.

customer_reviews.title: Let there be remote controlled light!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! A single bulb with no other hardware required, I just downloaded the app and now it's up and running! I had a small problem setting it up at first, then found out it was my Wifi network settings. I also love that it integrates with several hubs, so if I choose to expand my home automation later I can!
customer_reviews.author: Booferson J McGrugen

customer_reviews.title: Really like this bulb even tho at first i had some ...
customer_reviews.text: Really like this bulb even tho at first i had some issues. I contacted LIFX support and got timely responses and it was found that there was an issue with the bulb itself. After they helped me troubleshoot to no avail a replacement was sent to me in less than a week. Just had to add this seeing that im seeing other reviews stating that the LIFX support didn't help. Im currently in the process of purchasing three more :)
customer_reviews.author: Jamillah Rojas-Simeon

customer_reviews.title: Choose a smart switch instead.
customer_reviews.text: The features this bulb offers are great, but I have found the use of the bulb to be buggy and unreliable. In the future I will be buying a smart switch rather than a smart bulb. The app for iOS was decent though, and integration with IFTTT worked sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Erik M. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother if you're buying for Echo
customer_reviews.text: We can't get it to connect to our Echo at all. Alexa can't discover it despite them being right next to each other. Super expensive lightbulb without any of the smart capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Will not stay connected to the network. I have ...
customer_reviews.text: Will not stay connected to the network. I have given this product time to develop hoping that a firmware update would fix the constant disconnects. No Such Luck. 4 out of 5 times when I attempt to turn the bulb on either by the android app or using Alexa it is not connected.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Wake up light!
customer_reviews.text: I currently use this lightbulb for waking up everyday, as I can set schedules through the app, and it is so much more powerful and practical than the Philips Wake up lights when used in a bed lamp fixture!
customer_reviews.author: abuyer

customer_reviews.title: Not ready
customer_reviews.text: Android app, firmware update, and integration with home automation are all not ready for release to paying customers and require fighting it to work eventually. But at least it lights up given current the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They work with my echo wonderfully, very easy to set-up and control
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 of these two color and two just white. They work with my echo wonderfully, very easy to set-up and control. They schedule to come on and off very easily as well.
customer_reviews.author: Neal B. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay connected to wifi for more than 2 minutes ...
customer_reviews.text: Won't stay connected to wifi for more than 2 minutes. Phones have no problem with wifi in the same location.
customer_reviews.author: A. Perella

customer_reviews.title: it is okay...
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit difficult to get it connected and out of the 4 bulbs, one did not connect. Once connected it seems to work most of the time. I had to reconnect 2 of them after a week.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Software sucks! Extremely difficult to install and even after installation
customer_reviews.text: Software sucks! Extremely difficult to install and even after installation,highly unpredictable wifi connectivity with home network. Most of the time bulbs do not show up in the app for you to turn it On or Off. Wastage of money! I have the TP- link plug and the Emberlight adapter that are much easier to connect and use.
customer_reviews.author: knag

customer_reviews.title: Love these bulbs
customer_reviews.text: In my basement my ceiling fan light and light over my living space are wired to the same switch. I could not separate these two and give them different switches. Now with these lights I can have them off and keep the backlight of the fan on or dim these lights however I see fit. Very easy setup as well
customer_reviews.author: tom gause

customer_reviews.title: Great bulb
customer_reviews.text: The bulb is great. The description says the bulb can be used indoor and outdoor; however, the booklet that came with the bulb states it is for indoor use ONLY. Since I purchased it to use as a flood light I returned the bulb.
customer_reviews.author: ValleygirlDC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Lightbulb
customer_reviews.text: don't be scared by the price. It basically lasts forever and has great functions such as a built in timers, hue changing, dimming, and all from your smartphone. I wish LIFX had an app for the iPad though.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M.

customer_reviews.title: LIFX LIES
customer_reviews.text: No, it is NOT easy to setup. Not easy at all. Other than that it's a little too dim for my liking. I will most likely move it to another lamp and buy a different company's product.
customer_reviews.author: M. S. Cohen

customer_reviews.title: they were great and love the range of white lighting you can ...
customer_reviews.text: These are a pain to setup, but after getting them setup, they were great and love the range of white lighting you can select.
customer_reviews.author: okitsugu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. Works well with Echo though a little hard to setup. Will buy more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: dagerr

customer_reviews.title: Get this brand!!
customer_reviews.text: Get this brand if you're getting smart lights. This is my 14th or so LIFX bulb. Never had any problems ever.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: A waste of money the light stopped working with Lifx app ...
customer_reviews.text: A waste of money the light stopped working with Lifx app a month after I bought it and could no longer return or exchange. Now I have regular light that I could have paid way less money.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the price. No information on how to use it. No help in support web site. Never got it working with my Amazon Echo device.
customer_reviews.author: M. America

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: Awful and overpriced thought it would be nice not to have to buy a bridge. Should have got the Hue or anything else at that matter. The device after a month no longer can detect wifi to connect to and no help from LIFX to fix issue.
customer_reviews.author: Dayda

customer_reviews.title: Since I purchased this product about 2 months ago, ...
customer_reviews.text: Since I purchased this product about 2 months ago, it has not worked reliably. I have programmed it to turn on and turn off one bulb at pre-set times. It works for a few days and then it stops working and I have to reset the bulb and re-add it onto the LIFX ios app. I also tried it with the IF app with the same results. Hopefully, future LIFX app updates will resolve this problem.
customer_reviews.author: KTL

customer_reviews.title: Wifi LED bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Love these bulbs. Use them in a theater room. Control them with a logitec remote control. Work great. Fully adjustable. Only downside is they are a bit expensive.
customer_reviews.author: M. R. Colella

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Terrific. Works great with Echo. Love the lights and Echo
customer_reviews.author: FL SNOWBIRD

customer_reviews.title: Put these outside over our garage. Now I know ...
customer_reviews.text: Put these outside over our garage. Now I know the lights will be on if we get home later than expected and I don't need to remember to turn them off.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Dobrovolsky

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: A bit of a challenge to set up the first time but once it is it works great. "Alexa... Tell LIFX to turn on the living room light" "Okay"
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... network requires that all lamps must be in a good reception part of the house
customer_reviews.text: The fact that it is independently connected to the Wi-Fi and not via Hub on a mesh network requires that all lamps must be in a good reception part of the house. I often experience lights of the same group to get disconnected from the network while others stay connected and then group commands work poorly. - keep that in mind before buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great with the Echo.
customer_reviews.text: I have a house full of these bulbs. They work just great with my Amazon Echos.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best item I have bought in a long time
customer_reviews.text: Best item I have bought in a long time. Love having control on lighting from anywhere I can use my smart phone.
customer_reviews.author: jean

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Works as it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Works as it's supposed to. I just hope the bulb works long enough to warrant the $20 I paid for it.

customer_reviews.title: Problems with Alexa
customer_reviews.text: This did not work with Alexa for me. I think it was an older bulb but was still supposed to work with Alexa with update of software. It did not.

customer_reviews.title: Not great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not great for the price. Went offline a few times and I can't set a timer which was my main complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Jshen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I hooked this light up to my Echo and can't wait to get more bulbs.

customer_reviews.title: good to try

customer_reviews.title: Using Alexa 6 bulbs in home total. We run ...
customer_reviews.text: Using Alexa 6 bulbs in home total. We run 4 in the living room 24/7 still working well. Would disconnect frequently in beggining until got new google router.
customer_reviews.author: matt k.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Kept dropping off my WiFi for no apparent reason. Firmware update didn't work. Returned for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, wonderful that it works with Alexa ! Too bad it is now discontinued, as I would have bought more !

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Works great with Google Home. However, the setup was a bit of a hassle. Otherwise it is great.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, got it to flash the light bulb better with my kindle, my android phone didn't get it to flash to good.

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to connect to the network. I've bought ...
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to connect to the network. I've bought 2 more and failed to connect. Send back after I've try for 2 hours. Bought philips with the bridge
customer_reviews.author: mihail daniel dedu

customer_reviews.title: Love these work with Alexa and my iPhone
customer_reviews.text: Love these work with Alexa and my iPhone . AWESOME.. 5 stars So worth the money! Going to buy more.

customer_reviews.title: I bought them to use with my Echo but love the features it has on the App
customer_reviews.text: I bought them to use with my Echo but love the features it has on the App. I have it in my Foyer and with the App I'm able to set Schedules for it to turn on and off with Sunrise/Sunset

customer_reviews.title: it works great. Absolutely recommend it
customer_reviews.text: The initial setup and scheduling is a little confusing and weighs more than an average light bulb. Beyond that, it works great. Absolutely recommend it!

product_meta.title: LIFX Smart LED Light Bulb, Wi-Fi, 800-A19, Adjustable Whites, Dimmable, Works with Alexa
product_meta.description: The LIFX White 800 is the first adjustable White Wi-Fi LED light bulb with the power to choose a full range of vibrant warm to cool whites, from a single bulb. Works with Nest.
feature_bullets: Works with Amazon Alexa to support dimming and shades of white settings through voice control (Alexa device sold separately)
Easy to set up; Built-in Wi-Fi no hub

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars270 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
